select lu.user_id,lu.user_name,lu.phone,lu.sex,lu.status,hl.house_num,hl.house_area,hu.unit_name,hb.build_name,pl.park_name from live_user as lu left join live_house as lh on lu.user_id = lh.user_id left join house_list as hl on lh.house_id = hl.house_id left join house_unit as hu on hu.unit_id = hl.unit_id left join house_building as hb on hb.build_id = hu.build_id left join live_park as lp on lu.user_id = lp.user_id left join parking_list as pl on pl.park_id = lp.park_id where 1=1
and lu.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and lu.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
select lu.*,lr.role_id from live_user as lu, live_role as lr where lu.user_id = lr.user_id and lu.user_id =#{userId}
